definitions.definition: ( with "the" , singular only ) Alternative letter-case form of Moon ( “ the Earth 's only permanent natural satellite ” ) .

main_definition: ( with "the" , singular only ) Alternative letter-case form of Moon ( “ the Earth 's only permanent natural satellite ” ) .

definitions.definition: Any natural satellite of a planet .
examples: The stargazer observed the moons of Jupiter for over a year.
That's no moon , you idiot... it's a space station!

definitions.definition: A month , particularly a lunar month .
examples: They stayed with their aunt and uncle for many moons .

definitions.definition: A representation of the moon, usually as a crescent or as a circle with a face; a crescent-shaped shape, symbol, or object.
examples: The wizard costume was decorated with stars and moons .

definitions.definition: A crescent -like outwork in a fortification .
examples: The moons surrounding the city walls were built in the sixteenth century.

definitions.definition: The eighteenth trump / major arcana card of the tarot .
In hearts , the action of taking all the point cards in one hand.

main_definition: ( informal , by extension of Moon ) Any natural satellite of a planet .
secondary_definitions: ( literary ) A month , particularly a lunar month .
A representation of the moon, usually as a crescent or as a circle with a face; a crescent-shaped shape, symbol, or object.
A crescent -like outwork in a fortification .
The eighteenth trump / major arcana card of the tarot .
( card games ) In hearts , the action of taking all the point cards in one hand.
